title: How to Make Spicy Relish

steps.headline: Chop the onion, jalapeno pepper, and bell pepper into strips of approximately one half(.5) of an inch wide(1.27 centimeters) and 2 inches(5.08 centimeters) long.
Place the onion and jalapeno peppers into a food processor.
steps.description: Blend them until the chunks are about an 1/8 of an inch(0.32 centimeters) cubed.

steps.headline: Add the pickles to the chunks of onions and jalapeno peppers.
Process the mixture until the consistency is that of relish.
Place the finished relish mixture in a sealed jar.

text: Chop the onion, jalapeno pepper, and bell pepper into strips of approximately one half(.5) of an inch wide(1.27 centimeters) and 2 inches(5.08 centimeters) long.  Cube the pickles.  Place the onion and jalapeno peppers into a food processor. Blend them until the chunks are about an 1/8 of an inch(0.32 centimeters) cubed. Add the pickles to the chunks of onions and jalapeno peppers.  Process the mixture until the consistency is that of relish.  Add the Diet Lime Coke.  Stir the mixture.  Place the finished relish mixture in a sealed jar.  Refrigerate for 3 hours.  Finished.
